text: "Hair of the Dog" is a 1975 song from Scottish rock band Nazareth and is the title track from their sixth studio album Hair of the Dog. It went to number 44 in Germany and was released as a B-side of Love Hurts in the United States. It was covered by Guns 'N' Roses for their fifth studio album "The Spaghetti Incident?". ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Nazareth (band) songs Category:Warrant songs Category:Bauhaus (band) songs Category:The Ramones songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs
title: Hair of the Dog (song)
